name: market for used purse seiner, wood | used purse seiner, wood | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18795/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'used purse seiner, wood', in the Global geography.;This market connects the supply chain of used purse seiners, wooden from the point of their generation till the place they receive their final treatment. No transportation is considered in this market as the treatment is assumed to be on the shore. Used purse seiner, wooden is any purse seiner, wooden reaching its end of life timeframe.

The activity starts with the input from the treatment processes.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
tags: Sector: Fishing & Aquaculture; Waste Treatment & Recycling

exchanges.description: EOL of a purse seiner, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW), after 30 years lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
